name: Gan Tu
title: Co-founder & Software Expert & Graphic Design
bio: I have a tremendous passion for learning cross disciplinary subjects. Motivated by my relentless intellectual curiosity, I make efforts to acquire skills and insights in education, law, business, engineering, and design etc. I have lead and taken roles in several award winning projects with these skills, and I am excited to leverage all these experiences to explore the space, which first inspired my learning journey.
